title: Two Sum
definition: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

title: Palindrome Check
definition: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome. Ignore casing and non-alphanumeric characters.

title: FizzBuzz
definition: Write a function that prints numbers from 1 to n. But for multiples of 3 print 'Fizz' instead of the number, and for the multiples of 5 print 'Buzz'. For numbers which are multiples of both three and five print 'FizzBuzz'.
